front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Draft International Standard - Systems and Software Engineering--Life Cycle Processes--Project Management
front.abstract: This document provides normative content specifications for project management plans concerned with systems, and software systems. This document also provides detailed discussion and advice on applying a set of technical management processes that are common to both the system and software life cycles as covered by ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207 respectively. The discussion and advice are intended to aid in the preparation of the normative content of project management plans.
